Breeding Tool description: Get color range and gene rate of two dragons.
Name: Name
card tip 1: Background is avaliable to set like 'transparent', 'red', '#f0f0f0'. Maybe I'll add the function of setting background image.
card tip 2: Left and right gene colors are used when the genes are different. The left gene use the left color. So do the right gene. If the genes are the same, the basic gene color is used. The line under the gene text show the ratio.
card tip 3: CJK characters are avaliable to input for dragons' name. But please change the name font or they may be ugly.
